intro: Coniogramme fraxinea var. tirapensis, commonly known as the Tirap coniogramme, is a rare and endemic fern species native to the Philippines. It belongs to the family Blechnaceae and is characterized by its delicate, lance-shaped fronds with a distinctive, finely divided structure.
